file.toolTipText: Directory or path to read from

string.toolTipText: Hostname of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

integer.toolTipText: Port number of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

select.toolTipText: Data routing (normalized alerts to Manager and/or raw data to nDepth)

integer.toolTipText: Number of seconds between log reads

FastPattern.pattern: %ACSXP-\d+-\w+: Configuration: EAP service "[-#\w]+": bad message policy set to '\w+'
%ACSXP-\d+-\w+: Configuration: shadow copy at [/:\w ]+, then daily at that time
%ACSXP-\d+-\w+: Protocol: Request from [\d.]+: Dropping packet, packet is a retransmission of one we are currently working on
%ACSXP-\d+-\w+: Server: (?:auth|device): ?Same date at start up time. No need to rollover

FastPattern.description: 5, ServiceInfo: Server, Check if CSV report exists
FastPattern.pattern: %ACSXP-\d+-\w+: Server: Check if CSV report exists, and populate the Unique user list

FastPattern.description: 6, ServiceInfo: Server, Checking timed out sessions
FastPattern.pattern: %ACSXP-\d+-\w+: Server: Checking for timed out sessions (?:\.{3}|in SessionManager)
%ACSXP-\d+-\w+: Server: Checking for username and response type from the CSV report
%ACSXP-\d+-\w+: Server: (?:Closing|Starting) [Ii]nterface [\d.]+, port \d+ \([+\w ]+\)

FastPattern.description: 9, ServiceInfo: Server, CSV check if remove older file
FastPattern.pattern: %ACSXP-\d+-\w+: Server: CSV check if need to remove older file [\d ]+

FastField.defaultValue: CSV check if need to remove older file

FastPattern.description: 10, ServiceInfo: Server, CSV file creation time
FastPattern.pattern: %ACSXP-\d+-\w+: Server: CSV file creation time [\d ]+
%ACSXP-\d+-\w+: Server: CSV report exists; ?Beginning to read the contents from CSV report
%ACSXP-\d+-\w+: Server: CSVReport::(?:open|rollover) file
%ACSXP-\d+-\w+: Server: CSVReport::removeOlderFiles [\d ]+
%ACSXP-\d+-\w+: Server: (?:database shadow succeeded|Opening configuration database)
%ACSXP-\d+-\w+: Server: LogFile(?:Packet|Session)BackingStore (?:Disc Threshold|High-water mark): ~?\d+ GB

FastPattern.description: 16, ServiceInfo: Server, No timed out sessions
FastPattern.pattern: %ACSXP-\d+-\w+: Server: No timed out sessions found in Session Manager '[-\w]+'
%ACSXP-\d+-\w+: Server: read first record from file
%ACSXP-\d+-\w+: Server: reloading enabled server
%ACSXP-\d+-\w+: Server: RemoteDomainAuth server AD is being marked up
%ACSXP-\d+-\w+: Server: Replication Disabled
%ACSXP-\d+-\w+: Server: Resurrected \d+ TLS session\(s\) from the external store
%ACSXP-\d+-\w+: Server: RollingEncryption using new key \d+ and aging key \d+
%ACSXP-\d+-\w+: Server: server agent loading .+
%ACSXP-\d+-\w+: Server: server agent state [A-Z0-9_]+
%ACSXP-\d+-\w+: Server: Session Backing Store: Resurrected \d+ sessions\.
%ACSXP-\d+-\w+: Server: Session purging (?:deactivated|enabled and activated)
%ACSXP-\d+-\w+: Server: settime dsttime \d+ \d+
%ACSXP-\d+-\w+: Server: Successfully populated unique user total \d+

FastPattern.description: 29, ServiceInfo: Server, Time taken to populate
FastPattern.pattern: %ACSXP-\d+-\w+: Server: Time taken to populate the unique user list: ?\d+ milliseconds

FastFormatter.condition: Time taken to populate the unique user list: ?(\d+) milliseconds
FastFormatter.format: Time taken to populate the unique user list: $7 milliseconds

FastPattern.pattern: %ACSXP-\d+-\w+: System: Cisco ACSExpress [\d.]+
%ACSXP-\d+-\w+: System: Packet pool stats \d+/\d+
%ACSXP-\d+-\w+: System: threads=\d+, memory=\d+, disk=\d+, nlogs=\d+, logsize=\d+, console=\d+, interact=\d+
%ACSXP-\d+-\w+: System: Trace output is being sent to file .+

FastFormatter.condition: Trace output is being sent to file (.+)
FastFormatter.format: Trace output is being sent to file "$7"

FastPattern.pattern: %ACSXP-\d+-\w+: System: version [\d.]+, build \d+; built
%ACSXP-\d+-\w+: Server: server agent starting MCD server '[^']+'
%ACSXP-\d+-\w+: Server: (?:server started|Starting Replication Manager|Starting Server)
%ACSXP-\d+-\w+: System: config/mcd \(Manage Config DB Server\) startup
%ACSXP-\d+-\w+: System: name/radius \(Radius Server\) startup
%ACSXP-\d+-\w+: System: server agent startup
%ACSXP-\d+-\w+: Server: (?:Replication Manager Stopped\.|Stopping Server|TacacsConnection Stop|TacacsPacket::stop)

FastPattern.description: 41, ServiceWarning: Protocol, address not in Clients list
FastPattern.matcher: (\d+) ([-\w.]+) %([-\w]+): (\w+): Packet from ([\d.]+): that address is not in the Clients list ?<([\w ]+)>.*
FastPattern.pattern: %ACSXP-\d+-\w+: Protocol: Packet from [\d.]+: that address is not in the Clients list ?<[\w ]+>

FastField.defaultValue: address is not in the Clients list

FastPattern.matcher: (\d+) ([-\w.]+) %([-\w]+): (\w+): Request from ([-\w.]+) \(([\d.]+)\): No NAS-IP-Address or NAS-Identifier attribute in packet (\w+).*
FastPattern.pattern: %ACSXP-\d+-\w+: Protocol: Request from [-\w.]+ \([\d.]+\): No NAS-IP-Address or NAS-Identifier attribute in packet \w+

FastField.defaultValue: No NAS-IP-Address or NAS-Identifier attribute in packet "$7"

FastPattern.description: 43, ServiceWarning: Protocol, invalid data in EAP request
FastPattern.pattern: %ACSXP-\d+-\w+: Protocol: Request from [\d.]+: invalid data in EAP request
%ACSXP-\d+-\w+: Protocol: Tacacs\+ Packet from [\d.]+: unknown packet type \(\d+\)

FastPattern.matcher: (\d+) ([-\w.]+) %([-\w]+): (\w+): AD Agent failed during authentication for user \((.+)\): reason: ?([\w ]+)
FastPattern.pattern: %ACSXP-\d+-\w+: Server: AD Agent failed during authentication for user \(.+\): reason:.+

FastField.defaultValue: AD Agent failed during authentication for user

FastPattern.matcher: (\d+) ([-\w.]+) %([-\w]+): (\w+): AD Agent netSamLogon Authentication for user: (.+) Failed: \((0x[a-f\d]+)\).*
FastPattern.pattern: %ACSXP-\d+-\w+: Server: AD Agent netSamLogon Authentication for user: .+ Failed: \(0x[a-f\d]+\)

FastField.defaultValue: AD Agent netSamLogon Authentication for user failed

FastPattern.matcher: (\d+) ([-\w.]+) %([-\w]+): (\w+): Authentication for user (.+) failed for reason = (\d+)
FastPattern.pattern: %ACSXP-\d+-\w+: Server: Authentication for user .+ failed for reason = \d+
%ACSXP-\d+-\w+: Server: Dropping packets
%ACSXP-\d+-\w+: Protocol: new connection 0x[a-f\d]+ from \[[\d.]+\]
%ACSXP-\d+-\w+: Protocol: Request from [\d.]+: Client requested that the Tacacs\+ authentication session be aborted
%ACSXP-\d+-\w+: Server: remote user '.+' - authenticated
%ACSXP-\d+-\w+: Server: user .+ authentication successful, connection 0x[a-f\d]+
%ACSXP-\d+-\w+: Protocol: Request from [\d.]+: User .+ (?:authentication|authorization) failed ?\(\w+\)
%ACSXP-\d+-\w+: Protocol: Request from [\d.]+: User .+ rejected +\([\w ]+\)

FastPattern.description: 55, UserLogonFailure: Protocol, User rejected by RemoteServer
FastPattern.matcher: (\d+) ([-\w.]+) %([-\w]+): (\w+): Request from ([\d.]+): User (.+) rejected[. ]* by RemoteServer: ([-.()\w ]+)
FastPattern.pattern: %ACSXP-\d+-\w+: Protocol: Request from [\d.]+: User .+ rejected[. ]* by RemoteServer: [-\w.]+ \([\w ]+\)

FastPattern.description: 56, FailedAuthentication: Server, Plain Text Authentication failed
FastPattern.matcher: (\d+) ([-\w.]+) %([-\w]+): (\w+): AD Agent Plain Text Authentication Failed for user: (.+)
FastPattern.pattern: %ACSXP-\d+-\w+: Server: AD Agent Plain Text Authentication Failed for user
